 2006-12412006-10-30,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of WILLIAM A. BLACK of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2009, in the place of Daniel F. Gallivan.
AttachmentsAttachment
